title: Florida Blue
shortDescription: Florida's Blue Cross Blue Shield insurer with extensive provider networks and autism coverage.
description: Florida Blue is Florida's Blue Cross Blue Shield company and the state's largest health insurer. As a Florida-based company, Florida Blue has an extensive network of providers throughout the state and offers plans through employers, the individual market, Medicare, and the Health Insurance Marketplace. Florida Blue plans include coverage for autism services including ABA therapy, speech therapy, occupational therapy, and behavioral health services, though specific coverage varies by plan type.
benefits: ABA therapy coverage included in most plans
Multiple plan options to fit different needs
requirements: Prior authorization required for many autism services
Annual benefit limits may apply on some older plans
